title: Ep271 Serial Killers on the Loose
description:
This week, the gals get spooked talking about some dangerous people lurking unnoticed. Topics include truck stop perils, abandoned freezers, and a very violent duo. Pour a glass of Winc's Chop Shop Cabernet, don’t trust anyone ever again, and tune in for Serial Killers on the Loose.
For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
